_navOrder.title: Navigation bar order
_navOrder.description: Determines the order in which the object is displayed in the navigation bar. Negative numbers (e.g. -100) are left-aligned. Positive numbers (e.g. 100) are right-aligned.

_isEnabled.title: Enable Navigation Title
_isEnabled.description: Enable or disable the 'Navigation Title' feature

_hideForMobile.title: Hide title for mobile view
_hideForMobile.description: Useful to declutter the navigation bar for mobile view where limited space is available

_useCourseTitle.title: Use course title
_useCourseTitle.description: Use the course's title. Will override anything in the 'title' field.

title.title: Title
title.description: The text that appears in the navigation bar
